pages.page:
I.1. The Institution is subdivided into
administrative units in accordance with
the organizational structure.

In this approved 2017 organizational structure Vice President for Research, Extension, Continuing Education and Trainings Services (VPRECETS) was renamed for Vice President for Research and Extension (VPRE); Knowledge Management Center was created and Executive Vice President position was abolished and Vice President for Planning and Development was created.
